extendedInfo.description: The app records voice memo, reminder/alarm, and calls. You can choose to record all calls automatically or specify phone numbers to record or not to record. Email recordings, attach photo, play, pause, forward/rewind with ease! Copy recordings to desktop via WiFi.Motorola Droid is not supported for call recording.

reviews.comment: Pretty good on G1. Would be nice if it could be set to automatically email all calls. Also, would be nice to be able to set the storage location.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It does not work at all and the app is nonrefundable. So if you buy this you are a fool since you have been warned!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: V. 2.7.1 NOT Droid compatable for recording calls. It will cause several big issues, including not hearing callers and silenceing ringer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This application was great on n95 but absolutely useless on my new Samsung galaxy s2. I am stunned such a great tool has gone so bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does work properly
reviews.comment: It does not record both sides of any conversation! As it does not have any option to choose otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: *** DO NOT BUY THIS APP *** It does not work, and it will slow your phone down I paid the price you don\'t have to
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just switched from the G1 to the Motorola Droid. It was awesome on the G1 please make it compatible with the Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very bad publicity for finger trip & ultimate voice recorder software. Please fix your app before selling it. DO NOT BUY. DO NOT DOWNLOAD..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works on G1 but volume of other party on phone call is VERY low, not working on Vibrant at all, please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It does not work on 2.2. Maker knows about this but has not made any updates the last half year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pure crap.... didn\'t send file with email and can BARELY hear the other side of phone call... fix and maybe worth it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The voice record button does not work . the auto record button .does not record automatic pre assigned numbers . could not record .Evo 4g & epic 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fine for just a memo file but DOES NOT record calls on a Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Others mention low volume of other party during playback. Try no volume. Unable to hear other party at all. Nexus One. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: I tried for over an hour to get this to record phone conversations, couldnt get it to work! Cant get it to delete anything even though the time says 0:00:0 it knows it didnt work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s not what I expected, a friend recommended it...NO GOOD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very poor recording quality on droid and messes up ringer sound level. Also has a very sketchy refund process. Don\'t buy this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Runs as a service all the time, rather than trigger by call state. The dev got the audio right, but the code is, well, pretty weak. Not worth $5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Records only silence on my G1, even when using speakerphone. Getting refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I purchased this soft , when I on automatic record the phone will not funcationing.Give me a suggestion
